TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SmtpCapabilities extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Capabilities supported by an SMTP server.
Docs.remarks: Capabilities are read as part of the response to the EHLO command that is issued during the connection phase of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities Authentication = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The server supports the AUTH extension (rfc2554), allowing clients to authenticate via supported SASL mechanisms.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities BinaryMime = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The server supports the BINARYMIME extension (rfc3030).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities Chunking = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The server supports the CHUNKING extension (rfc3030), allowing clients to upload messages in chunks.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities Dsn = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The server supports the DSN extension (rfc1891), allowing clients to specify which (if any) recipients they would like to receive delivery notifications for.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities EightBitMime = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The server supports the 8BITMIME extension (rfc2821), allowing clients to send messages using the "8bit" Content-Transfer-Encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities EnhancedStatusCodes = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The server supports the ENHANCEDSTATUSCODES extension (rfc2034).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The server does not support any additional extensions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities Pipelining = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The server supports the PIPELINING extension (rfc2920), allowing clients to send multiple commands at once in order to reduce round-trip latency.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities Size = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The server supports the SIZE extension (rfc1870) and may have a maximum message size limitation (see ).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities StartTLS = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The server supports the STARTTLS extension (rfc3207), allowing clients to switch to an encrypted SSL/TLS connection after connecting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpCapabilities UTF8 = int32(512)

Docs.summary: The server supports the SMTPUTF8 extension (rfc6531).
